name: 50 UX Metrics (Notion Repository)
description: This is a helpful Notion repository. It lists 50 key UX metrics, providing a quick reference guide for product teams and data analysts. It categorizes metrics by type, source, update frequency, and relevance, helping you focus on what matters for your product.If you need a consolidated, easy-to-navigate overview of UX metrics, this Notion template will be a useful starting point.
